languages.text: "Пусть каторжане и надзиратели вооружатся и дадут бой вторженцам".
"Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."
languages.original_text: "Пусть каторжане и надзиратели вооружатся и дадут бой вторженцам".

traits.locale_text: "Arm the convicts and the wardens up and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens up and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the wardens and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."
"Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

languages.text: “让所有囚犯和监察员武装起来，抗击入侵者。”
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: “让所有囚犯和监察员武装起来，抗击入侵者。”

languages.text: «Arme a los convictos y a los supervisores y haga que luchen contra los invasores».
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: «Arme a los convictos y a los supervisores y haga que luchen contra los invasores».

languages.text: 「受刑者と看守を武装させ、インヴェイダーと戦わせるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: 「受刑者と看守を武装させ、インヴェイダーと戦わせるんだ」
「受刑者と看守を武装させ、インヴェイダーと戦わせるんだ」

languages.text: « Armez les détenus et les contremaîtres, qu'ils puissent combattre ces créatures. »
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: « Armez les détenus et les contremaîtres, qu'ils puissent combattre ces créatures. »

languages.text: "Bewaffnet die Sträflinge und die Aufseher und lasst sie gegen die Invasoren kämpfen."
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."

traits.locale_text: "Bewaffnet die Sträflinge und die Aufseher und lasst sie gegen die Invasoren kämpfen."
"Bewaffnet die Sträflinge und die Wächter und lasst sie gegen die Invasoren kämpfen."

languages.text: "Mahkûmları ve gözetmenleri silahlandırıp işgalcilere karşı kullanalım."
languages.original_text: "Arm the convicts and the overseers and have them fight the invaders."
